verses.text: The word that came to Jeremiah from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, saying ,
Hear ye the words of this covenant , and speak unto the men of Judah , and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem ;
And say thou unto them, Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of Israel ; Cursed \add be\add* the man that obeyeth not the words of this covenant ,

Which I commanded your fathers in the day \add that\add* I brought them forth out of the land of Egypt , from the iron furnace , saying , Obey my voice , and do them, according to all which I command you: so shall ye be my people , and I will be your God :

That I may perform the oath which I have sworn unto your fathers , to give them a land flowing with milk and honey , as \add it is\add* this day. Then answered I, and said , So be it , O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 11.5 \ft So…: Heb. Amen\f*

Then the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said unto me, Proclaim all these words in the cities of Judah , and in the streets of Jerusalem , saying , Hear ye the words of this covenant , and do them.
For I earnestly protested unto your fathers in the day \add that\add* I brought them up out of the land of Egypt , \add even\add* unto this day , rising early and protesting , saying , Obey my voice.

Yet they obeyed not, nor inclined their ear , but walked every one in the imagination of their evil heart : therefore I will bring upon them all the words of this covenant , which I commanded \add them\add* to do ; but they did \add them\add* not.\f + \fr 11.8 \ft imagination: or, stubbornness\f*
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said unto me, A conspiracy is found among the men of Judah , and among the inhabitants of Jerusalem.

They are turned back to the iniquities of their forefathers , which refused to hear my words ; and they went after other gods to serve them: the house of Israel and the house of Judah have broken my covenant which I made with their fathers. \p

¶ Therefore thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will bring evil upon them, which they shall not be able to escape ; and though they shall cry unto me, I will not hearken unto them.\f + \fr 11.11 \ft to escape: Heb. to go forth of\f*

Then shall the cities of Judah and inhabitants of Jerusalem go , and cry unto the gods unto whom they offer incense : but they shall not save them at all in the time of their trouble.\f + \fr 11.12 \ft trouble: Heb. evil\f*

For \add according to\add* the number of thy cities were thy gods , O Judah ; and \add according to\add* the number of the streets of Jerusalem have ye set up altars to \add that\add* shameful thing , \add even\add* altars to burn incense unto Baal.\f + \fr 11.13 \ft shameful…: Heb. shame\f*

Therefore pray not thou for this people , neither lift up a cry or prayer for them: for I will not hear \add them\add* in the time that they cry unto me for their trouble.\f + \fr 11.14 \ft trouble: Heb. evil\f*

What hath my beloved to do in mine house , \add seeing\add* she hath wrought lewdness with many , and the holy flesh is passed from thee? when thou doest evil , then thou rejoicest.\f + \fr 11.15 \ft What…: Heb. What is to my beloved in my house\f*\f + \fr 11.15 \ft when…: or, when thy evil is\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* called thy name , A green olive tree , fair , \add and\add* of goodly fruit : with the noise of a great tumult he hath kindled fire upon it, and the branches of it are broken.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , that planted thee, hath pronounced evil against thee, for the evil of the house of Israel and of the house of Judah , which they have done against themselves to provoke me to anger in offering incense unto Baal. \p
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath given me knowledge \add of it\add*, and I know \add it:\add* then thou shewedst me their doings.

But I \add was\add* like a lamb \add or\add* an ox \add that\add* is brought to the slaughter ; and I knew not that they had devised devices against me, \add saying\add*, Let us destroy the tree with the fruit thereof, and let us cut him off from the land of the living , that his name may be no more remembered.\f + \fr 11.19 \ft the tree…: Heb. the stalk with his bread\f*
But, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , that judgest righteously , that triest the reins and the heart , let me see thy vengeance on them: for unto thee have I revealed my cause.

Therefore thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of the men of Anathoth , that seek thy life , saying , Prophesy not in the name of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that thou die not by our hand :

Therefore thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , Behold, I will punish them: the young men shall die by the sword ; their sons and their daughters shall die by famine :\f + \fr 11.22 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*
And there shall be no remnant of them: for I will bring evil upon the men of Anathoth , \add even\add* the year of their visitation.
